text: Northwestern Krai of the Russian Empire Northwestern Krai () was an unofficial subdivision (krai) of the Russian Empire in the territories of the former Grand Duchy of Lithuania (present-day Belarus and Lithuania). The center was in Vilna city. Northwestern Krai together with the Southwestern Krai formed the Western Krai. It included six guberniyas: *Governorate-General of Vilna: **Vilna Governorate **Kovno Governorate **Grodno Governorate *Minsk Governorate *Mogilev Governorate *Vitebsk Governorate ==See also== *Southwestern Krai *Western Krai == References == * Шафарик, П.И.
